director.name: 拉多斯拉夫·沃伊诺维奇 Radoslav Vojnović

introduction: Two girls put curse on their former boyfriends, and send two demons, Strahinja and Lola, to take their lives. Strahinja must deliver the main heroes of this world or, by the decision of the judge of the Dark Vilayet, be returned to the unpleasant state of death. The four stories that make this omnibus film, follow main characters whom Lola and Strahinja are supposed to pick up. Each of them tries to avoid death. You will see how the sanguine, phlegmatic, melancholic and choleric cope with the death officers.
